Venice Beach (Los Angeles), CA:

Snapchat is hiring!

We offer amazing benefits, cool offices right on the Venice Beach boardwalk, two meals daily by our private chef. We are incredibly well funded, yet still retain a little bit of the social startup vibe.

We are looking for full-time, local, generalist coders, front-end web devs, and data scientists. Please be smart, have a strong background in computer science and equally strong coding skills.

Apply via [http://grnh.se/4v8agh], and feel free to ping me directly if you have any questions or need anything. My email is 'anthony' followed by the at sign and my company's domain name.
